name: Operation Wire
description:
You are a virus. Your mission: Investigate computers on the network and find out as much information about them as you can.

How to play: Mini-game: Complete as many stages of the pre-maze minigame as you can. This determines the amount of health you start with. Main game: Move through the maze using the arrow keys. Avoid enemies such as the FIREWALL and the ANTIVIRUS. Collect powerups that unlock folders, reveal paths and boost your attributes. Return to the beginning to piece together the information you have collected and win the game!
